originalTitle: The king's speech - and why it has foreigners in South Africa worried
title: The king's speech - and why it has foreigners in South Africa worried
content: The Zulu king was trying to calm anti-migrant feelings but ended up using a highly derogatory phrase.

originalTitle: Aspiring Nigerian singer dies after being bitten by a snake
title: Aspiring Nigerian singer dies after being bitten by a snake
content: Ifunanya Nwangene, a former contestant in The Voice Nigeria, died after not getting the antivenom she needed.

originalTitle: Four Britons die after holiday sickness in Cape Verde, say lawyers
title: Four Britons die after holiday sickness in Cape Verde, say lawyers
content: A law firm says it is representing the families of six people who holidayed in Cape Verde.

originalTitle: Russian drone attack on bus in Ukraine kills at least 12
title: Russian drone attack on bus in Ukraine kills at least 12
content: Russian drone strike kills 12 mine workers in Ukraine's Dnipropetrovsk region, injuring seven others.

originalTitle: Israel orders eviction of Bedouins as settlers target West Bank schools
title: Israel orders eviction of Bedouins as settlers target West Bank schools
content: Israeli forces order the expulsion of 40 Bedouins near Ramallah as settlers attack schools and homes in other locations.

originalTitle: Israel says it will ban MSF from operating in Gaza
title: Israel says it will ban MSF from operating in Gaza
content: Medical charity has been barred for not providing Israeli authorities with personal details of its staff in enclave.

originalTitle: Twelve miners killed by Russian strike in Ukraine, energy company says
title: Twelve miners killed by Russian strike in Ukraine, energy company says
content: Seven others were reported injured in the strike near a bus carrying the workers on Sunday.

originalTitle: Epstein sent $75,000 to accounts linked to Mandelson, files suggest
title: Epstein sent $75,000 to accounts linked to Mandelson, files suggest
content: Lord Mandelson says he has no record or recollection of receiving the sums and does not know if the documents are authentic.

originalTitle: Iranian protester Erfan Soltani released on bail, reports say
title: Iranian protester Erfan Soltani released on bail, reports say
content: Reports in January had said he was due to be executed after his arrest in connection with anti-government protests.

originalTitle: Why Man City have toppled Chelsea as England's best
title: Why Man City have toppled Chelsea as England's best
content: Manchester City's victory over Chelsea was confirmation they are the best team in the country this season and they are the WSL champions in waiting.

originalTitle: Wolves accept reduced £48m offer for Strand Larsen
title: Wolves accept reduced £48m offer for Strand Larsen
content: Wolves have accepted a reduced offer worth £48m for striker Jorgen Strand Larsen from Crystal Palace.

originalTitle: Saint-Maximin leaves club over racist abuse of his children
title: Saint-Maximin leaves club over racist abuse of his children
content: Former Newcastle United winger Allan Saint-Maximin leaves Mexican side Club America by mutual consent after saying his children were the victims of racist abuse.
